foodWasteIncrease.claim: Matsvinnet från svenska restauranger har ökat från 6 kg till 11 kg per person och år sedan 2020
foodWasteIncrease.claimEnglish: Food waste from Swedish restaurants has increased from 6 kg to 11 kg per person per year since 2020
foodWasteIncrease.sourceTitle: Matsvinn på restauranger ökar – de har lösningen

missed2025Target.claimEnglish: Sweden's interim target was clear: a 20 percent reduction in food waste by 2025
missed2025Target.notes: Swedish government's official food waste reduction targets as part of EU sustainability goals

industryMargins.claim: För en bransch med marginaler på 3-5%

roiClaim.claimEnglish: For every krona invested in reduced food waste, restaurants save an average of seven kronor
roiClaim.sourceTitle: WRAP Food Waste Reduction Roadmap - Economic Benefits
roiClaim.notes: International industry standard ROI data adapted for Swedish market context
